channel.title: HiPoland
channel.description: An English language podcast dedicated to promoting Poland, it's language, culture, and on bringing the expat community in Poland together.

item.title: Episode1: Welcome to the podcast!
item.description: Today, I have decided to launch an English language podcast in Poland that is dedicated to promoting Poland. As this is the first podcast it will be quite boring and uneventful, however soon it will develop a huge following and bring in loads of traffic.
